comments:
20050526

I took our org.eclipse.ui.win32 fragment and renamed the properties file and
updated the build.properties and manifest files.

When I did a commit I got the following exception while the dialog was
populating. This did not seem to stop me actually doing the commit.

From looking at the code, it appears that this is a bug in the 
System.arrayCopy method. I suspect it is being caused by a children array that 
is empty (i.e. System.arrayCopy is being called to copy an array of size zero 
into another array of size 0). Compare could get around this by explicitly 
checking for an empty children array.
This is a concurrency problem in the old sync framework. No plan to fix.
